name: Open WebUI
title: Private AI Chat Interface
description: Self-hosted ChatGPT-like interface supporting OpenAI, Anthropic Claude, Google, and more. All conversations stored locally with user management.

env.label: OpenAI API Key
env.name: OPENAI_API_KEY
env.description: Your OpenAI API key (optional if using other providers)

env.label: WebUI Secret Key
env.name: WEBUI_SECRET_KEY
env.description: Secret key for session management (change this!)

env.label: Domain
env.name: DOMAIN
env.description: Your domain for proper URL configuration

note: Configure API keys for your preferred AI providers. All chat history stored locally. Create admin user on first visit.
